altername_name: Quiz Darake no Jinsei Game - Un to Atama de Daifugou!
name: Quiz Darake no Jinsei Game
overview: Based on the Game of Life series, this time the gameplay is not the usual board game style, the player advance through the board answering the questions properly (there are more than 10000 questions) and goes through different lifetimes from childhood to old age. The player can choose a male or a female character, change the character likes and play different game modes and choose to play against the computer or human player (up to 4 players at the same time using the multitap function).
